author: Will Canny, AI Boost
title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Adds Bitcoin Staking Via Babylon as BTC Driven DeFi Picks Up
description: Kraken users will now be able to stake their bitcoin directly, locking it in a custodial vault on the native chain.
content:
Crypto exchange Kraken has launched bitcoin 
 staking through a new integration with Babylon, as decentralized finance on BTC picks up. Babylon is a Bitcoin-native protocol that enables BTC to secur… [+1725 chars]
